entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
